dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 403 IH: Ensuring the Safety of Our Military Aviators Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Farenthold introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: A bill to limit the construction or alterations of wind turbines near a military airbase or military airfield.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring the Safety of Our Military Aviators Act of 2017.

section.header: Prohibition of certain wind turbine projects
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law or any determination by the Secretary of Transportation, the Secretary of Defense shall not approve any application for the construction or alteration of a wind turbine if such turbine is proposed to be constructed or altered within 25 miles of a military airbase or military airfield.
